verses.roman:
āveśete nityānanda nā hailā sāvadhāne
kāśīśvara-govinda āchilā anya-sthāne

synonyms: āveśete—in great ecstasy; nityānanda—Nityānanda Prabhu; nā—not; hailā—became; sāvadhāne—careful; kāśīśvara—Kāśīśvara; govinda—Govinda; āchilā—were; anya-sthāne—in another place.
translation: Not even Lord Nityānanda Prabhu, Kāśīśvara or Govinda took care of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu when He fell down. Nityānanda was in great ecstasy, and Kāśīśvara and Govinda were elsewhere.
